bibl.title: What Happened to the Ancient Library of Alexandria? With a Preface by Ismail SERAGELDIN.

series.title: Library of the Written World. 3. The Manuscript Word.

bibl.note: International Seminar organized by the Alexandria Project at the Bibliotheca Alexandrina, 26-28 September 2004. - 13 contributions. - Pp. vii-ix: I.S., Preface; - 1-7: M.E.-A., Introduction. - Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: EL-ABBADI Mostafa and Omnia Mounir FATHALLAH (Edd.), What Happened to the Ancient Library of Alexandria? With a Preface by Ismail SERAGELDIN. (Library of the Written World. 3. The Manuscript Word. 1.)
Leiden - Boston, E.J. Brill, 2008, 8°, xxi-259 pp., 1 tabl., figg., 1 plan, 6 pll. ISBN 978-90-04-16545-8. €99.

International Seminar organized by the Alexandria Project at the Bibliotheca Alexandrina, 26-28 September 2004. - 13 contributions. - Pp. vii-ix: I.S., Preface; - 1-7: M.E.-A., Introduction. - Bibliography. Index.
C.R. par Georges Nachtergael †, ChrEg 84 (2009) Nos 167-168, pp. 375-377. - Luciano Canfora, CR N.S. 59 (2009) pp. 560-562.
